text: Yemwe abemeye! Nimube abashyigikira (idini rya) Allah, nk’uko Issa mwene Mariyamu yabwiye abigishwa be ati “Ni ba nde banshyigikira mu nzira ya Allah?” Abigishwa baravuga bati “Turi abashyigikiye Allah.” Nuko itsinda rya bamwe muri bene Isiraheli riremera, irindi rirahakana. Maze dushyigikira abemeye batsinda abanzi babo
